DocAttribute.Name: AnnotatedBySymbols
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to the terminator symbols that may be assigned to the dimension curve. There shall be either zero, one or two terminator symbols assigned.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR51
DocWhereRule.Documentation: A dimension curve shall be used by at least one referencing dimension curve directed callout, i.e. it should not be used outside of the context of a dimension element group.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR52
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The dimension curve should not be annotated with more than one terminator having the role "Origin", nor with more than one terminator having the role "Target".

DocWhereRule.Name: WR53
DocWhereRule.Documentation: All terminators assigned to a dimension curve shall be dimension curve terminators.
